# SCNPhysicsWorld

**Class**

The global simulation of collisions, gravity, joints, and other physics effects in a scene.

## Declaration

```swift
class SCNPhysicsWorld
```

## Overview

You do not create [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsWorld] objects directly; instead, read the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNScene/physicsWorld] property of an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNScene] object. Use physics world object to perform the following tasks:

- Manage global properties of the simulation, such as its speed and constant gravity. (For more precise control of gravity and similar effects, see the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsField] class.)
- Register behaviors that modify interactions between the sceneâ€™s physics bodies, such as joints and vehicles. For more details, see [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsBehavior].
- Specify a delegate object to receive messages when two physics bodies contact each other
- Perform specific contact tests, and search for physics bodies in the scene using ray and sweep tests.

## Managing the Physics Simulation

- **gravity**: A vector that specifies the gravitational acceleration applied to physics bodies in the physics world.
- **speed**: The rate at which the simulation executes.
- **timeStep**: The time interval between updates to the physics simulation.
- **updateCollisionPairs()**: Forces the physics engine to reevaluate possible collisions between physics bodies.

## Registering Physics Behaviors

- **addBehavior(_:)**: Adds a behavior to the physics world.
- **removeBehavior(_:)**: Removes a behavior from the physics world.
- **allBehaviors**: The list of behaviors affecting bodies in the physics world.
- **removeAllBehaviors()**: Removes all behaviors affecting bodies in the physics world.

## Detecting Contacts Between Physics Bodies

- **contactDelegate**: A delegate that is called when two physics bodies come in contact with each other.
- **contactTestBetween(_:_:options:)**: Checks for contacts between two physics bodies.
- **contactTest(with:options:)**: Checks for contacts between one physics body and any other bodies in the physics world.

## Searching for Physics Bodies

- **rayTestWithSegment(from:to:options:)**: Searches for physics bodies along a line segment between two points in the physics world.
- **convexSweepTest(with:from:to:options:)**: Searches for physics bodies in the space formed by moving a convex shape through the physics world.

## Search Options

- **SCNPhysicsWorld.TestOption**: Keys in options dictionaries that affect how SceneKit searches for bodies in a collision, ray, or sweep test.

## Physics in a Scene

- **SCNPhysicsField**: An object that applies forces, such as gravitation, electromagnetism, and turbulence, to physics bodies within a certain area of effect.
- **SCNPhysicsBehavior**: The abstract superclass for joints, vehicle simulations, and other high-level behaviors that incorporate multiple physics bodies.

## Inherits From

- NSObject
